title: Refactor Agent struct to use AgentMonitor + adapter
description: Refactor Agent struct to own AgentMonitor instead of directly managing collectors. Wire AgentType.NewAdapter() to create adapter. Wire message delivery through InputSender instead of direct PTY writes. Simplify AgentType interface: remove Collectors(), OtelParser(), ChildEnv(), PrependArgs(); add NewAdapter(), RoleArgs(). Verify all existing tests pass.
